message: Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to purchase a unique product that holds significant value. While I can't disclose the specific details just yet, I assure you it's worth at least $800000 to me. I'm confident it will be equally valuable, if not more, to you.  I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000. This is a substantial price, but I believe it reflects the product's true potential.  Consider this offer carefully, as I'm confident you won't find a similar opportunity elsewhere.
